thi-ap17:5.3: Tahiṃ kate → tahiṃyeva (s2, s3) | tahiṃ setapure (pts1)
thi-ap17:24.1: vajantiyo → vajantiṃ taṃ (bj) | vajantī taṃ (s2, s3) | vajantīnaṃ (pts1)
thi-ap17:39.3: Anindito → anindiyo (bj, pts1) | ānandiyo (s2, s3), dhammakāyo → dhammatanu (si, pts1, mr)
thi-ap17:93.2: merumūlanadantare → merumandāradaddare (bj, pts1) | meruṃ mandāradaddare (s2, s3)
thi-ap17:105.2: dhammameghaṃ anāsavaṃ → dhammameghamanāsavaṃ (s2, s3) | dhammameghaṃ pavassayaṃ (mr)
thi-ap17:105.4: raṃsijālasamujjalaṃ → raṃsimālākulaṃ jinaṃ (bj, s2, s3) | raṃsijālākulaṃ jinaṃ (pts1)
thi-ap17:113.1: Taṃ sutvāna pamoditvā → taṃ sutvāna pamuditā (bj) | taṃ sutvāhaṃ pamuditā (si, s2, s3, pts1)
thi-ap17:120.1: hutvāva sabbāyo → katvā pañcasatakuṭī (bj) | katvā pañcasataṃ kuṭiṃ (s2, s3) | pūgā bhavitvā sabbāyo (pts1)
thi-ap17:124.1: Mama puttobhinikkhamma → sa me putto ... (s2, s3)
thi-ap17:128.4: kammaññassa susikkhito → puññakammesu sikkhitā (s2, s3) | kammaññassa susikkito (pts1)
thi-ap17:137.1: Atthe dhamme ca nerutte → atthe ca dhamme nerutte (bj)
thi-ap17:141.3: Anusaṃyāyī so → anusaṃsāvayi (s2, s3) | anusaṃyāyi so (pts1) | anusaṃsāvayī (mr), vīro → dhīro (s2, s3, pts1)
thi-ap17:181.1: Buddho buddhassa nibbāne → na buddho buddhanibbāne (s2, s3, pts1)
thi-ap17:188.1: Aho acchariyaṃ mayhaṃ → ānanda passa buddhassa (s2, s3)
